mapper.select: SELECT L.locationno, L.locationtype, L.locationtitle, L.locationcreator, L.locationcontent, L.locationphone, L.locationaddress, L.locationstatus, L.view_count, L.locationname FROM LOCATION_RESERVATION LR JOIN LOCATION L ON LR.location_no=L.locationno WHERE REPLACE(SUBSTR(DAY,1,10),'/','-')=#{date}
